snippet.title: Pilot dies in outback Qld helicopter crash
snippet.content: A helicopter pilot who was mustering cattle has died in a firey crash after hitting power lines in outback Queensland. Emergency services were called to the crash scene around 20km north of Cloncurry, Queensland early on Wednesday. A fire on board the aircraft was extinguished before firefighters arrived, a Queensland Fire and Emergency Services spokeswoman said. The crash was reported to the Queensland Ambulance Service at around 7.30am on Wednesday by another pilot. Originally published as
